alert.note: Alert for Inyo; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 1:50AM PDT until September 02 at 4:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO AND SAN BERNARDINO COUNTIES... At 150 AM PDT, On going flash flooding will remain a threat on State Route 127 between Baker and Shoshone due to very heavy rainfall that occurred Friday afternoon and evening. No additional heavy rain is expected. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of normal dry washes, low-water crossings and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Shoshone, State Route 127 between mile markers 14 and 30. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
